entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puntzi Mountain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.0°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 62 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
